info.title: Accounts API
info.description: Provides CRUD operations on the accounts resource.

get.description: Returns a list containing up to 20 accounts. You can paginate through account by supplying next_starting_index in your subsequents calls. next_starting_index contains the account_id of the last account_id of the current page.

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

401.description: Returned when the request does not contains the user's credentials.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

500.description: Returned when an unexpected error occured on the server side.

parameters.name: NextStartingIndex
parameters.description:
NextStartingIndex is a cursor for pagination. It's an AccountID that defines
the current place in the total list of Accounts.

AccountID.description: AccountID is the unique identifier of an account.

Status.description: Status is the status of the account.

ContractDate.description: ContractDate is the date of the contract initialization.

CreditLimit.description: CreditLimit is the allowed credit limit.

CurrentTerm.description: CurrentTerm is the account validity period.

DueDate.description: DueDate is the loan maturity date.

MaturityDate.title: MaturityDate is the maturity date, format is ISO 8601

OwnerName.description: OwnerName is the name of the account's owner.

accountsAccount.description: Account holds all details about a bank account.

AccountID.description: AccountID is the identifier of the account.

MajorType.description: MajorType is the type of the account.

accountsCreateAccountRequest.description: CreateAccountRequest wraps all required fields for an account creation.

AccountID.description: AccountID is the unique identifier of the newly created account.

CreditTransactionNumber.description: CreditTransactionNumber is the transaction number of the credited account.

DebitTransactionNumber.description: DebitTransactionNumber is the transaction number of the debited account.

MajorType.description: MajorType is the type of the account.

accountsCreateAccountResponse.description: CreateAccountResponse is the response envelope for an account creation.

accountsEntityType.description:
EntityType describes the type of the entity.

 - Pers: EntityType_Pers is an individual customer.
 - Org: EntityType_Org is an organisation customer.

Result.description: Result is a list containing up to 20 Accounts.

HasMore.description: HasMore indicates if there are more accounts available.

accountsGetAccountsResponse.description: GetAccountsResponse wraps the list of accounts.

AccountID.description: AccountID is the unique identifier of the account to update.

accountsUpdateAccountRequest.description: UpdateAccountRequest wraps all fields available for update.

Cur.description: Cur is the currency of the amount.

Num.description: Num is the value of the amount.

typesMajorCategory.description:
MajorCategory describes the category of the account.

 - Dep: MajorCategory_Dep for deposit category.
 - Loan: MajorCategory_Loan for loan category.

typesMajorType.description:
MajorType describes the type of the account.

 - Checking: MajorType_Checking account.
 - Saving: MajorType_Saving account.
 - TimeDeposit: MajorType_TimeDeposit for a time deposit account.
 - CommercialLoan: MajorType_CommercialLoan for a business loan account.
 - MortgageLoan: MajorType_MortgageLoan for a home loan account.
 - ConsumerLoan: MajorType_ConsumerLoan for a consumer loan account.

OAuth2.description: Access to accounts resources is restricted to authenticated users. The authentication process follows the Authorization Code flow.
